verses.name: Numbers 32:20
verses.text: And Moses said unto them, If ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before the Lord to war,

verses.name: Numbers 32:21
verses.text: And will go all of you armed over Jordan before the Lord, until he hath driven out his enemies from before him,

verses.name: Numbers 32:22
verses.text: And the land be subdued before the Lord: then afterward ye shall return, and be guiltless before the Lord, and before Israel; and this land shall be your possession before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 32:23
verses.text: But if ye will not do so, behold, ye have sinned against the Lord: and be sure your sin will find you out.
